text: The 2011 French F4 Championship season was the nineteenth season of the series for 1600cc Formula Renault machinery, and the first season to run under the guise of French F4 Championship. The series began on 9 April at Circuit de Lédenon and ended on 30 October at Circuit Paul Ricard, after seven rounds and fourteen races. ==Driver lineup== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! ! R2 | 30 October | Pierre Gasly | Aurélien Panis | Pierre Gasly |} ==Championship standings== * Points are awarded to the top ten drivers in both races on a 15–12–10–8–6–5–4–3–2–1 basis. Additional points are awarded to the driver achieving pole position and fastest lap in each race.
